snippet: An unregulated offshoot of the Frankfurt Stock Exchange that gives small companies access to capital markets is closing because of fraud complaints, leaving hundreds of companies scrambling to find an alternative.
abstract: An unregulated offshoot of the Frankfurt Stock Exchange that gives small companies access to capital markets is closing because of fraud complaints, leaving hundreds of companies scrambling to find an alternative.

headline.main: In Europe, Entry Closes on Start-Ups With Their Foot in the Door
headline.print_headline: Troubled Exchange to Close, Leaving Start-Ups Scrambling
